name: Gh0stlyGh0sts
description:
# Gh0stly Gh0sts

 is the first Omnichain NFT collection, with native chain traversals powered by Layer Zero Labs. The Gh0sts roam 7 EVM chains:

- Ethereum
- Arbitrum
- Optimism
- Binance Smart Chain
- Avalanche
- Polygon
- Fantom

This page is for Gh0sts currently roaming the Binance Smart Chain.
